item.title: Adobe Photoshop
item.description: Adobe Photoshop # Adobe Photoshop is the preeminent Image Editing program produced by Adobe. Photoshop can be used for editing / enhancing photographs as well as producing entirely new image assets. File Management # Photoshop files are saved in .psd format. They can be stored on your local machine or in cloud storage at Adobe. These files often grow to extreamely large file sizes, making their binary format particularly unsuited for version control.
